content: सामर्थ्यं {@--1@} Power, force, capacity, ability, strength. {@--2@} Sameness of aim or object. {@--3@} Oneness of meaning or signification. {@--4@} Adequacy, fitness. {@--5@} The force or sense of words, the signifying power of a word. {@--6@} Interest, advantage. {@--7@} Wealth. (सामर्थ्यात् ‘by the force of, on the strength of, by dint of, by reason of, as a consequence of’).
